title: ✦STUNNING 4Bed/4Bath DUPLEX Apt avail.9/1 (Heat+Water inc.)(1/2 FEE)
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 70927923', 'Rent: $4,800 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 4', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Beautiful 4 bedroom/4 bathroom TWO FLOOR apartment available in Brighton.', 'Very convenient to Boston College.', 'Unit features newly renovated bathrooms, living room and kitchen with granite counter-tops, stainless steel appliances, and dishwasher/disposal.', 'Outdoor private deck.', 'Gleaming hardwood floors throughout.', 'High end finishes.', 'Large bedrooms.', 'Laundry and storage in building.', 'Street parking available.', 'No pets.', 'Please call/email Chris to schedule a showing!', '7812281766', 'chrisg @ <URL>', 'Click the link below to search all of my available apartments!', 'https://ygl.is/chris-gemayel', 'Bus: 57 Washington St @ Oak Sq (0.43 mi)', 'Bus: 64 Hobart St @ Brooks St (0.14 mi)', 'Bus: 70 Arsenal St @ Talcott Ave (0.47 mi)', 'Chris Gemayel', 'Phone: 781 228 1766', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC', '107 Brighton Avenue', 'Boston, MA 02134', "Not what you're looking for?", 'Message me anyways!', 'I have access to one of the largest apartment databases in Greater Boston and would love to help with your next home search!', "Search Boston's largest selection of apartments <URL>", 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
